reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://install.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
SETUP - Create a TV Show
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'TV Show' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter 'dc83976b0b3045a' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Logo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Cover Media 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Banner 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'TV Show dc83976b0b3045a has been created.' is present.
STEP 2
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content types' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Movie' menu link.
Click the 'Manage fields' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Movie dialog'.
STEP 3
Enter 'Relationships' in the 'Add existing field' text box.
Select 'Pub TV Relationship: field_tv_shows (TV Shows)' from the 'select existing field' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Relationships dialog'.
STEP 4
Select 'Show' from the 'TV Relationship Widget Depth' drop down list.
Click the 'Save settings' button.
Verify success message of 'Saved Relationships configuration.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 5
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Movie' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Enter '56df199bea944e3' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Movie dialog'.
STEP 6
Select 'dc83976b0b3045a' from the 'Show' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Movie 56df199bea944e3 has been created.' is present.
STEP 7 - N/A to Movie content type
STEP 8
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'TV Show' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter '471b5b4b75da479' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Logo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Cover Media 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Click the Banner 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Show dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'TV Show 471b5b4b75da479 has been created.' is present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'TV Season' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Season dialog'.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter '7828b380928a455' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter '1' in the 'Season Number' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Season dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Season dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Relationships' link.
Select '471b5b4b75da479' from the 'Show' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'TV Season 7828b380928a455 has been created.' is present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'TV Episode' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Episode dialog'.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter '6250d920649e4b2' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter '1' in the 'Episode Number' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create TV Episode dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Relationships' link.
Select '471b5b4b75da479' from the 'Show' drop down list.
Select '7828b380928a455' from the 'Season' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'TV Episode 6250d920649e4b2 has been created.' is present.
